phase_name: Wormhole Discovery AOL-732356: Phase 1 - Reconnaissance & Anchor Establishment
goal: Map wormhole signature AOL-732356, establish anchor point on Asteroid XXXV, and initiate long-term monitoring network.
description: Deploy reconnaissance probes to investigate anomalous wormhole signature. Establish Anchor Law claim on Asteroid XXXV as primary monitoring and exploitation anchor point. Set up quantum sensor network for continuous wormhole activity tracking.

mission_log.name: Initial Probe Deployment
mission_log.description: Launch reconnaissance probes equipped with quantum sensors to map wormhole signature AOL-732356. Establish safe approach vectors and initial stability readings.

objectives.name: Launch Reconnaissance Probes
objectives.description: Deploy 5 quantum-sensor equipped probes to investigate wormhole signature AOL-732356

mission_log.name: Asteroid XXXV Anchor Establishment
mission_log.description: Establish Anchor Law claim on Asteroid XXXV as primary monitoring and exploitation anchor point for wormhole AOL-732356. Deploy beacon array and claim markers.

objectives.name: Deploy Anchor Beacon Array on Asteroid XXXV
objectives.description: Install quantum beacon array on Asteroid XXXV to establish Anchor Law claim and provide navigation reference for wormhole operations

objectives.name: Register Anchor Law Claim
objectives.description: Complete legal registration of Asteroid XXXV as anchor point under Anchor Law provisions for wormhole exploitation

mission_log.name: Quantum Monitoring Network Setup
mission_log.description: Establish continuous quantum sensor network around wormhole AOL-732356 with Asteroid XXXV as anchor point. Enable real-time monitoring and early warning systems.

objectives.name: Deploy Quantum Sensor Network
objectives.description: Install 8 quantum sensor platforms in strategic positions around wormhole AOL-732356, anchored to Asteroid XXXV

phase_risks.wormhole_instability: High risk of probe loss during initial mapping
phase_risks.asteroid_claim_dispute: Potential competing claims on Asteroid XXXV
phase_risks.sensor_interference: Quantum field interference with monitoring equipment
